sentences.sContent: If there is no warning for one within half an year, the punishment of warning can be revocable;
sentences.sContent_eng: If there is no warning for one within half an year, the punishment of warning can be revocable;
sentences.sCn: 半年内无再犯警告处罚，表现良好的员工可撤销其警告处分。

sentences.sContent: If one is well behaved and has made great contributions to company as well within one year, the demerit recording can be revocable;
sentences.sContent_eng: If one is well behaved and has made great contributions to company as well within one year, the demerit recording can be revocable;
sentences.sCn: 一年内表现良好且为公司作出重大贡献的可撤销一次记过。

remMethod.val: re(反) + voc(喊) + able → 反过来喊的 → 可撤销的

trans.tranOther: capable of being revoked; able to be cancelled
